descriptionSubText: Discover fun tours, activities to do, and so much more!
signUpDescription: Let your inner adventurer free to discover what the kingdom has to offer !
continuingAgreeText: By continuing you agree to our
changePasswordDescription: Please enter your Email Address to receive a Verification Code
confirmPasswordHint: Please, enter a new password again.
errorEmailEmpty: Email field is required and cannot be empty.
errorEmail: Invalid email format. Please try again.
errorEmailCapitalCharacters: Email should not contain capital characters
errorPasswordEmpty: Password field is required and cannot be empty.
errorPassword: Password must be at least 8 characters long and contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character.
nameIsRequired: Name field is required and cannot be empty.
inValidName: Your name can only contain letters
nameLengthError: Name should be between 2 and 25 characters
